response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its high worth to you at $15,000, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while allowing us to maximize the product's potential impact on your business. I look forward to your positive consideration.", "product_price": 14000}
